review: Great addition to my already stellar Roku lineup.  Small and easy to install. Way better than a Chromecast with so much more features.  Costs a little more than one but definitely well worth it.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Simple does not work. Cuts out after 10 min, takes forever to load home screen, reboots for no apparent reason, slow to respond to remote....if at all. I have two other Roku players and my suggestion is you avoid the stick.

review: This is a great option and WAY cheaper than getting a smart TV and has WAY more channels than a smart TV.
author: WAmom

review: Works very well for our needs. Streams Netflix,  prime, hbo go ect with no problems.  A little sluggish but it's not a big deal. Well worth the money.
author: Mm622

review: I have 3 Roku boxes and bought this Roku stick. it worked fine at first, but i noticed it has really cheap connectors and hangs down under it's own weight. now 3 month later it does not work. i would definitely recommend buying the Roku 3 box not the stick. it's just a very flimsy design. I recommended the roku stick to a friend shortly after i bought it and his is broke too. Do not buy this unless you want to replace it in less than 3 months.
